basics.name: Mehul Gupta
basics.label: The Guy Behind Your Feed
basics.summary: As an individual who understands both - technology & business, I can help your team leverage the power of data by creating insightful stories that help drive business decisions.

education.institution: Robert H. Smith School of Business, University of Maryland
courses: Big Data and Artificial Intelligence for Business
Business Process Analysis for Information Systems

work.summary: TuneIn empowers people to hear exactly what they love the moment they want it, and discover a universe of audio, all in one place
highlights: Built text classifiers using nltk, sentence transformers, and BERT to cluster similar podcasts and extract key topics from transcripts, enhancing discovery of podcasts based on trending topics, reducing drop off in user funnel and improving personalization by 5%
Implemented ML models for strategic placement of mid-roll audio advertisements, increasing revenue from ads by 20%
Collaborated with user research team to generate ad-hoc SQL reports of customer review data, reducing customer churn by 7%

work.summary: Founded a startup which focuses on the development of a ticketing platform in the Web3 space
highlights: Participated in all aspects of business development from market research and finance to operations and marketing, ensuring that the company's vision was followed
Formulated company's vision, goals, and objectives; hired and trained new employees
Built and maintained professional relationships with potential investors and partners; attended various startup and business events
Onboarded India's most talented musicians, allowing them increase their visibility, growth, and royalties
Performed secondary market research and industry analysis for cybersecurity SaaS as a B2C offering in North America
Identified market gap, recommended minimal product offering using competitive benchmarking and devised go-to-market strategy

work.company: Robert H. Smith School of Business, University of Maryland
work.summary: Graduate Teaching Assistant for the course - Essential Data Skills for Business Analytics using Python (BMGT404)
highlights: Assisted with development and design of the curriculum, supporting research-led and scholarly approach to student learning
Led discussion sessions and tutored data models, python logistic regression techniques, and higher-level statistical modeling

work.summary: Humit is a social media platform for bite-sized audio sharing and discovery
highlights: Developed and led implementation of product roadmap while embracing Agile-DevOps
Automated day-to-day processes using bots and web crawlers, enhancing employee productivity by 30%
Analyzed methods to create efficient database schemas through UML diagrams and ERD’s, reduced SQL query time by 20%
Documented requirements, researched growth strategies, identified user pain points, recommended new product features, and analyzed feasibility increasing user satisfaction rate by 80%

work.summary: ColoredCow is a business consultancy firm
highlights: Developed web platforms through agile SDLC methods, delivered projects to clients in 50% of the estimated time
Designed database architecture using MySQL to incorporate data of 40,000 users, providing them access to online education
Coordinated with multiple stakeholders and designed go-to-market strategy to increase customer acquisition by 40%
Introduced and launched a Discord Server for TIMD, hosted several series, music sessions on the same and ensured engagement of 1000+ members within a month
Spearheaded Rig Rundown, India's first ever live music podcast of its kind
Organized India's first Independent Music Awards
Maintained liaisons with artists in the Indian Music Industry
Organised workshops on topics revolving around music production, music release, building press-kits, etc.
Curated artists and genre specific playlists under TIMD

work.summary: Sofar Sounds, is a music events startup company, responsible for various small performances, hosted in over 400 cities
highlights: Identified and managed talent for Sofar Sounds
Assisted in curation of various events in Jaipur as a part of their global movement
Independently undertook organisation of events, logistic handling, hospitality and ensured participation from candidates across the country
Executed online gigs to ensure a consistent event cycle even amidst the lockdown

skills.name: Programming Languages
keywords: Python (numpy, pandas, BeautifulSoup, nltk, scikit, keras, TensorFlow, BERTopic, ahocorasick, umap, SentenceTransformer, seaborn, matplotlib, plotly, huggingface)

references.name: Akshay Kapoor (Founder - The Indian Music Diaries)
references.reference: It is my pleasure to recommend Mehul Gupta. His ability to work independently and sincerely is a trait I have valued while he has worked with us. Mehul has also shown exemplary capacity to identify potential crisis situations and manage them effectively. Mehul was found to be sincere and enterprising with a dedication to get the task completed. In a small amount of time, Mehul became an active contributor to the community development with an ability to work independently and creatively.

references.name: Prithvi Sankar (Founder - Humit)
references.reference: I had the pleasure of working with Mehul during his stint at humit. The fact that he always enjoyed what he did made his work of the highest quality, as he paid attention to all the details in every aspect. He approached every task with great enthusiasm and effort. Mehul knows his way around people, is good with partners, does whatever it takes to help colleagues, and gets things done. Hoping to cross paths again in the future!

references.name: Shivakumar Vastrad (Batchmate - University of Maryland)
references.reference: I have known Mehul for a little over a year now. I had the pleasure of working with him in various projects and datathons', during our time together at R. H Smith School of Business, University of Maryland, College Park. Mehul is very thorough and meticulous, and the results translate into his work. He is passionate about the tasks that he takes up and is always willing to help his peers. Mehul is committed to consistent learning and sharing his knowledge. He is an asset to any team he works for.
